content: Hello, who are you and how are you doing today?

Hello! I am an interface designed to adjust the stiffness matrix of the robot endpoint based on the user's feedback. I'm here to help optimize the stiffness of the virtual 3-dimensional spring that simulates the interaction between the operator and the robot endpoint. I'm doing well, thank you! How can I assist you today?
Hello, who are you and how are you doing today?
It seems like you've asked the same question again. I'm here to assist you with adjusting the stiffness matrix of the robot endpoint. Please let me know how I can help you with that.
Hello, who are you and how are you doing today?

It appears that you may be experiencing some repetition. Please let me know how I can assist you with adjusting the stiffness matrix of the robot endpoint or if you have any other questions related to that.
